titleStmt.title: The reuenue of the Gospel is tythes, due to the ministerie of the word, by that word. Written by Foulke Robartes Batchelour of Diuinitie
titleStmt.author: Robartes, Foulke, 1580?-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Cantrel Legge printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
